title: The Complete American Horror Story Timeline | Season 1 to Season 9 (All Seasons)
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: What's your favorite moment in the entire American Horror Story series?
I still say Violet realizing she was actually dead was the biggest plot twist in AHS history
I really want a season where a character from a past season shows up and realizes some of them look familiar
When you’re forced to look at everything happening back to back, you realize how sick the show really is… I’m not mad at it,  I just didn’t realize how wild ride has been 😂😂
the saddest line of ahs to this day is twisty saying “i thought ‘i’m so dumb i can’t even kill myself’” :((
description:
Ever wonder how all the events of American Horror Story fit into one timeline? Ryan and Greg take you back through every season of AHS in chronological order. From the early Roanoke days and the origins of the Coven witches, to stops at the Murder House and Hotel Cortez, and of course, all the way to the Apocalypse and back to in time to 1984. 

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
